September 29, 1954
Hr. Waldo Abbot, Chairman
NAEB Network Acceptance Committee
Station WUCM
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Waldoi
By my count the Network Acceptance Committee has to date reviewed exactly
100 submissions, including both one-shot programs and series. And that
is a lot of tape.
See you in New fork.
Sincerely,
JHÂ»Jy
John Holt
